section.p: You can delete a trigger definition for an organization as follows:

ol.li: From the operation list, select deletetriggerdefinition and click select.

In the triggerdefinitionkey field, enter the unique key of the trigger definition to be deleted. The trigger definition key is generated automatically when the trigger definition is created. You can retrieve the keys of all trigger definitions for an organization by executing the retrievetriggerdefinitions function.

p.note: A trigger definition can only be deleted if there is no process based on it in the database.

conbody.section:
The syntax of the respective CLT command is as follows:
java -jar oscm-operatorsvc-client.jar <userkey> <password> deletetriggerdefinition triggerdefinitionkey=<Trigger definition key>
